title: Sneezing Dua Non Muslim
description: Authentic supplications for Sneezing Dua Non Muslim
seoContent: Authentic invocations and supplications for Sneezing Dua Non Muslim. Derived from reliable sources including Hisnul Muslim.

items.title: Dua 189
items.translation: May Allah guide you and rectify your condition.

description_ar: من الأذكار والأدعية الصحيحة: دعاء العطاس
